overview: Two very good friends meet up at a bar for shots. Later, deciding who needs to pay for the bill and who needs to walk out first are among the things they cannot figure out. This short film, starring Manuel Madrid, Mark Gregory Bayani, and Glaizel Gale, shows a hilarious take on these two inseparable friends who subconsciously find a way to not say goodbye to each other just yet.
title: Last Bottle
